graph_title: Nombre de pays dotés d’une législation nationale relative à la statistique conforme aux Principes fondamentaux de la statistique officielle
indicator_name: Nombre de pays dotés d’une législation nationale relative à la statistique conforme aux Principes fondamentaux de la statistique officielle
SDG_GOAL: Goal 17: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
SDG_TARGET: Target 17.18: By 2020, enhance capacity-building support to developing countries, including for least developed countries and small island developing States, to increase significantly the availability of high-quality, timely and reliable data disaggregated by income, gender, age, race, ethnicity, migratory status, disability, geographic location and other characteristics relevant in national contexts
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 17.18.2: Number of countries that have national statistical legislation that complies with the Fundamental Principles of Official Statistics
STAT_CONC_DEF: The indicator refers to the number of countries that have national statistical legislation that complies with the Fundamental Principles of Official Statistics. This refers to the number of countries that have a statistical legislation which respects the principles of UNFOP.
